p: Extensive discussion on traditional usages of P. cubeba found in the website known as ‘Useful Tropical Plants Database’ [ 127] revealed that P. cubeba is a bitter, antiseptic and stimulant herb with its fruits having diuretic and expectorant effects while also improving digestion. In addition, the immature dried fruits are used in the treatment of coughs, bronchitis, sinusitis, throat and genito-urinary infections, poor digestion and amebic dysentery.
